name: Partygoer Horror House Version 1
description:
Plot

Your little sister was lost several days ago, after the police found nothing about it, you got desperate and went to the last known location of your sister. There doesn't seem to be much there, just an empty and cold field, suddenly, something hits you on the head, when you wake up. You are in a very old room.

Controls

W, A, S, D - Move

E - Interact

Q - Unhide

G - Drop

Esc - Pause

FAQ Does it support Mobile?

No, for now it only supports (WEBGL) and PC (Windows10)

Is the Game going to update?

Yes!! There will be coming new updates, bug fixes, and plot.

How many People works in this Studio?

1.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Developer Note:

Thanks everyone who downloads or plays this game <3 I aprecciate a lot people enjoying my games and telling me bugs and their experience on their way, hope you like this game and merry christmas!!!
